Job Summary:


InfoDrive Solutions is seeking a highly experienced and motivated SAP Ariba Manager to join our team. The successful candidate will lead the SAP Ariba implementation and provide ongoing support to our clients. The SAP Ariba Manager will be responsible for managing all aspects of the implementation, including project planning, budgeting, design, testing, training, and documentation.

Responsibilities:

• Lead the implementation of SAP Ariba solutions for clients
• Develop project plans and timelines for implementation projects
• Manage project budgets and ensure projects are delivered on time and within budget
• Collaborate with client stakeholders to gather requirements, design solutions and identify areas of process improvement
• Conduct business process analysis to identify areas of improvement and recommend solutions
• Perform system configuration, testing, and training
• Provide ongoing support to clients post-implementation
• Work collaboratively with other project managers, business analysts, and technical resources to deliver high-quality solutions
• Develop and maintain project documentation

Qualifications:

• Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, or a related field
• Minimum of 7 years of SAP Ariba implementation experience
• Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
• Proven ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment
• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
• Strong knowledge of SAP Ariba modules including Procure-to-Pay, Source-to-Pay, and Supplier Lifecycle and Performance
• Experience with SAP ECC, S/4 HANA, and other SAP modules is a plus
• SAP Ariba certification is preferred
